mapper.select: SELECT EOS,FTC,FTCLocked,FTCPrice,univalent,quantity ,User_level as userLevel,version ,public_info as publicInfo,poundage,commission_scheme as commissionScheme, gathering_code as gatheringCode,system_account as systemAccount FROM ftc_system where sid = 1

select -- 当日充值------ (select IFNULL(sum(deal_amount),0) from ftc_deal where TO_DAYS(deal_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and type=2 and status=6) as dayRegistAmount, -- 当日释放 (select IFNULL(sum(deal_amount),0) from ftc_deal where TO_DAYS(deal_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and type=7 and status=6) as dayReleaseAmount, -- 冻结订单数 (select IFNULL(count(0),0) from ftc_deal where status=8) as totalFrozenOrder, -- 待回消息数 (SELECT IFNULL(count(0),0) from ftc_message where replay_flag=0) as totalMessage, -- 总充值 (SELECT IFNULL(sum(deal_amount),0) from ftc_deal where type=2 and status=6) as totalRegistAmount, -- 总释放 (SELECT IFNULL(sum(deal_amount),0) from ftc_deal where type=7 and status=6)as totalReleaseAmount, -- 总奖励 (SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from ftc_reward where status=6)as totalReward
SELECT h.hid, h.pid, h.catalog, h.content, p. picture_url AS pictureUrl FROM ftc_help h LEFT JOIN ftc_picture p ON h.pid = p.pid
mapper.update:
update ftc_help
catalog = #{catalog},
content = #{content},
where hid = #{hid}

update ftc_system
EOS = #{EOS},
FTC = #{FTC},
FTCLocked = #{FTCLocked},
FTCPrice = #{FTCPrice},
univalent = #{univalent},
quantity = #{quantity},
User_level = #{userLevel},
version = #{version},
poundage = #{poundage},
commission_scheme=#{commissionScheme},
gathering_code=#{gatheringCode},
system_account=#{systemAccount},
where sid=1
